thread.title: MSNBC’S Katy Tur Appears To Suggest That Trump Wants To Assassinate Reporters
thread.title_full: MSNBC’S Katy Tur Appears To Suggest That Trump Wants To Assassinate Reporters

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: MSNBC’S Katy Tur Appears To Suggest That Trump Wants To Assassinate Reporters
text:
10:15pm February 6,   
It’s not a secret that the mainstream media has become completely unhinged following the election of Donald Trump. 
There are many reasons for that. 
Ultimately, it is just really hard for them to accept that they aren’t the cool kid in the room anymore. 
Liberals lost the battle of ideas and now find themselves on the outside looking in and they just can’t come to terms with the fact that the American people rejected what the mainstream media had been shoveling down their throats for over a year. 
Check out this exchange between well documented Trump hater Katy Tur and Senator Deb Fischer and see if you notice anything a little odd. 
So, what’s going on there? 
The great T. Becket Adams is just as confused as you and I are. 
From Washington Examiner : 
Tur’s question is a bit all over the place, and it’s not exactly clear what she’s trying to say. She wonders aloud if Trump is “almost” giving himself “an excuse” by refusing to criticize Putin. 
She then says in the next breath that there have been a “couple dozen suspicious deaths of journalists in Russia” since Putin assumed control in 2000. Trump is supposedly giving himself “an excuse” to do what, exactly? 
What is Tur saying? 
That’s a good question. 
Sure sounds like she is implying Trump would like to assassinate journalists and he’s jealous that Putin allegedly has done so. 
One thing’s for sure, that’s not responsible journalism. LIKE this article?
